reviews.author: Casey Burton
reviews.review: Highly recommend NW Living Group! Mimi and her team (shout-out to John & Leela) been such a huge asset to us when buying and selling homes along with purchasing commercial property. Drawing from their experience and knowledge has been

ownerResponse.text:
Thank you , Casey!!
You know what really makes us happy?  
Its when we get to help awesome people like you and Britt achieve their goals  More

reviews.author: Brad Kerstiens
reviews.review: Sally helped us buy and sell our home. She was extremely kind, helpful,  and going above and beyond to help us find the perfect home. She helped line up a contractor to meet us at a showing and even played with our toddler was we viewed

reviews.author: Richard Chrappa
reviews.review: Sally walked us through a very difficult and complicated transaction, simultaneously selling and buying homes. She stood by us when the going got tough and we were still pushing forward. She was always enthusiastic, pleasant, encouraging

reviews.author: Eric Tepner
reviews.review: We recently shopped for and closed on a house in Bellingham from 6000 miles away! Sally Farrell was not only our eyes, ears and nose, she was always one step ahead and guided us through the entire process with little to no stress. I loved

reviews.author: Anne Kincaid
reviews.review: I recently sold a condo in Bellingham under difficult personal circumstances.  Sally Farrell and her team went above and beyond the call of duty in so many ways that far exceeded my hopes and expectations.  Sally was extremely knowledgeable

reviews.author: Michael & Kelly Powers
reviews.review: Honestly, our family would NOT have been able to find a home without Sally Farrell at Northwest Living (Exp Realty). Not only is she a wonderful human being, she is a highly skilled professional with great intuition. Sally helped us discern

reviews.author: Jennifer Gary
reviews.review: Mimi recently helped us sell my mother's condominium in Bellingham.  We had an excellent offer within a few days of putting it on the market.  Mimi was a pleasure to work with.  She not only knows the business, but goes above and beyond for

reviews.author: Helen Fogel Egan
reviews.review: Sally Farrell of NWLiving was our realtor in our recent home purchase in Bellingham, Wa.  Highly intuitive, Sally quickly figured out our housing priorities and found us the perfect new home for our relocation from Sedona, Arizona.

reviews.author: Heidi Higginbottom
reviews.review: Mimi is nothing short of an angel. When my family and I had the crazy idea of purchasing our future home while still living full time in Europe, Mimi was very up to the challenge. During the short time we did have in Bellingham, we felt

ownerResponse.text: It is working with people like Heidi, Derek and their family to help them achieve their goals that makes my work meaningful.  I could not be more blessed than to have the great joy of working with such lovely clients.

reviews.author: Erin Douglas
reviews.review: I cant say enough about the wonderful services we received during the sale of our house! We had numerous offers after just one day of the listing. Our realtor, Sally Farrell, led us through the painless process via email, text, and phone. The sale was complete in just 28 days. I highly recommend EXP!

reviews.author: JaneLee Waldock
reviews.review: Mimi's team was so knowledgeable, responsive, and supportive! Having worked with Mimi in the past, when I unexpectedly found the home for me, I wrote Mimi first thing in the morning and by that afternoon we had a game plan in place. I would definitely recommend working with EXP Realty and Mimi!

reviews.author: Mary Chaney
reviews.review: Mimi Osterdahl-Eggers is an excellent Realtor! We have used her considerable knowledge and expertise in 6 transaction in the last 2 years.  And she is delightful to work with!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Mary and Michael for the awesome review!  Working with lovely people like you to help you achieve your goals makes me so thankful and grateful to be a Realtor!

reviews.author: Kris Moulaison
reviews.review: Mimi is the BEST!! So great to work with...I highly recommend her to everyone. She is a knowledgeable, friendly, and conscientious professional who works really hard to delivery for all her clients!

reviews.author: Julie Bowman
reviews.review: Mimi is a true professional. She puts her clients interest as her top priority.  She is reliable a great communicator and an overall great agent

reviews.author: Phil Arnone
reviews.review: Sally Farrell helped my wife and I find our first home.  She really went above and beyond what I expected from a realtor.  Thanks Sally!!

ownerResponse.text: Sally is the best!  NW Living is lucky to have her in our team!

reviews.author: Julie Nicoll
reviews.review: Sally was a great realtor. She was invaluable to our search and always had a smile.

reviews.author: Sylvia Albers
reviews.review: Love this Lady !  She is so full of energy and life cant help but get excited about a home with her!  You have to check out a home with her and you will love her too!

reviews.author: Tami Elias
reviews.review: I am meeting agents in this grp here and there.  Seems like a great company.   Looking forward to deeper connections.

ownerResponse.text:
Thank you, Tami!  We appreciate the review and look forward to the same! 
If anyone you care about needs a Realtor, please share our name with them. -John and Mimi, NW Living

reviews.author: Test Pattern (seeit360)
reviews.review: I think NW Living is really making Real Estate accessible and approachable  for new agents and moving properties for clients. Kudos!

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for the kind words Greg!  We work hard to make sure our clients and our agents are taken care of and happy! -Mimi

reviews.author: Carrie Butler
reviews.review: The most wonderful people, with the most wonderful ethos! They truly are "ready professionals helping good people".

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Carrie!  We love helping nice people buy and sell real estate in this beautiful corner of the world we all get to call "home". -Mimi

reviews.author: Scott Wrobel
reviews.review: They did a great job.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the AWESOME review Scott!  We are so grateful and thankful for it and for YOU!

reviews.author: Jennifer Alexandria
reviews.review: Great Service!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Jennifer!  We strive to help all of our clients with top-notch service to help them achieve their real estate goals and dreams.
Thank you for the awesome review Hui-Ling!  We are so very grateful for it and for YOU!
Thank you Rideshare Bham for the awesome review!  We really appreciate it and we really appreciate YOU!
Thank you for the 5-Star review, Lulu!  All of our NW Living - eXp broker's seek to give 5-Star service to every single client we are blessed to serve!  -Mimi
Thank you for the awesome review Megan!  We are so grateful for it and YOU!
